txt.en: Shâkrum the Ripper can be found somewhere within Seregost's courtyards.\n\nYou should defeat Shâkrum the Ripper.

A bounty notice is pinned to the board, stamped with the royal seal of Gondor:

'Wanted: Shâkrum the Ripper
Somewhere within the courtyards of Seregost lurks the morvul known as Shâkrum the Ripper. He is personally responsible for leading several attacks on the Red Sky Clan. The Conquest of Mordor requests an adventurer breach Seregost and defeat this menace.'
Somewhere within the courtyards of Seregost lurks the morvul known as Shâkrum the Ripper. The Conquest of Mordor requests an adventurer to go defeat this menace.
